statements: SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT address FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_type FROM medical_images WHERE image_type='X-Ray' ORDER BY date_uploaded DESC;
SELECT patient_name, address, contact_number FROM patient_demographics WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address, contact_number FROM patient_demographics WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender, address, contact_number FROM patient_demographics WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, image_name, date_uploaded FROM patient_demographics pd JOIN medical_images mi ON pd.patient_id = mi.patient_id WHERE image_type='X-ray' ORDER BY date_uploaded DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_name, image_type FROM medical_images WHERE date_uploaded >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT study_type, study_date, imaging_results FROM imaging_studies WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM imaging_technicians WHERE technician_specialization = 'Radiology';
SELECT technician_name, technician_contact FROM imaging_technicians;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patient_demographics WHERE patient_dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT study_type, study_date, imaging_results FROM imaging_studies WHERE study_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, imaging_results FROM patient_demographics JOIN imaging_studies ON patient_demographics.patient_id = imaging_studies.patient_id;
SELECT technician_name, technician_contact FROM imaging_technicians WHERE technician_specialization = 'MRI';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT DISTINCT race FROM Patients ORDER BY race DESC;
SELECT record_type, record_date FROM Medical_Records WHERE physician_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT report_id, imaging_type FROM Imaging_Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT record_type, record_date, physician_name FROM Medical_Records WHERE physician_name='Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM Imaging_Reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, race, findings FROM Patients INNER JOIN Imaging_Reports ON Patients.patient_id = Imaging_Reports.record_id ORDER BY race ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, study_type, study_date FROM ImagingStudies ORDER BY study_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, specialization FROM Physicians WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age;

SELECT Patients.name, Physicians.name AS physician_name, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id JOIN Physicians ON Appointments.physician_id = Physicians.physician_id WHERE Appointments.status = 'Completed';

SELECT Patients.name, MedicalRecords.record_date, MedicalRecords.description FROM Patients LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age, gender FROM Patients GROUP BY gender HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY average_age DESC;
